survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Network Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle owners regarding their experiences and satisfaction with public EV charging networks, including ease of use, reliability, and payment methods.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clear and cover common concerns.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with single-choice radio buttons for this question. Include a neutral option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What payment methods do you typically use at public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an optional open-ended field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox with optional open text for 'Other')

script.question_text: What payment methods do you typically use at public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced when using public EV charging stations.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced when using public EV charging stations.
